metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7963 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** The GNU Multiple Precision Arithmetic Library (GMP)interfaces for PHP through 7.1.4 allow attackers to cause a denial ofservice (memory consumption and application crash) via operations on longstrings. NOTE: the vendor disputes this, stating "There is no securityissue here, because GMP safely aborts in case of an OOM condition. The onlyattack vector here is denial of service. However, if you allowattacker-controlled, unbounded allocations you have a DoS vector regardlessof GMP's OOM behavior."

criterions.comment: php5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
